name: Sqrxz IV
overview: The fourth part of the (now) quadrology Jump’n Think series Sqrxz brings you onto an cold icy island. Shiny marbles, evil penguins and ghosts, underwater creatures and many more to expect. Original Sqrxz made by Marcus Vesterlund and John Holmvall. Features: * Authentic Retro graphics – Pixels forever! * 10 die hard levels! * 11 great tunes! * Top 10 highscore! * Unlimited continues! * Hidden passages! * Cheat codes! (if you can find them)
